cast.name: 兹旦内克·斯维拉克 Zdeněk Svěrák

writer.name: 维克多·波尔森 Viktor Polesný

director.name: 维克多·波尔森 Viktor Polesný

this_title: Svěrák a Uhlíř - padesát let spolu
trans_title: 斯维拉克与乌利什：共度五十载
Svěrák and Uhlíř - fifty years together
introduction: A documentary look back on half a century of collaboration between a popular author's duo ... In 2017, Zdeněk Svěrák and Jaroslav Uhlíř celebrated the 50th anniversary of their collaboration, not only symbolically, but also with a pair of spectacular concerts at Prague's O2 Arena, where thousands of spectators came to listen to their songs. Immortal, almost popular songs like Strašidýlko Emílek , When a Horse falls in love , Cows , Electric Waltz , Statistics and many others came to be sung by parents who "still" know the songs, with their children who "already" know them. A television documentary by Viktor Polesný , who is the court director of favoritesHours of singing , it balances not only fifty years of cooperation between Zdeněk Svěrák and Jaroslav Uhlíř, but also provides an insight into their author-human relationship and the history of the creation of the most famous songs that still live their own lives. (Czech television)来源：https://www.csfd.cz/film/699937-sverak-a-uhlir-padesat-let-spolu/prehled/
